messages.subject: 7 year old wants to work
messages.msgSnippet: Samantha: I would be extremely grateful to find a 7-year-old who would be willing and responsible [basic stuff - no playing with knives, etc!] enough to be
messages.messageBody:
Samantha: I would be extremely grateful to find a 7-year-old who would be
willing and responsible [basic stuff - no playing with knives, etc!] enough
to be this mommy's helper for an hour or so, and spend some time playing with
my 3.5 year old dd!! She is an only child, and just worships "older" girls
right now; she would love this situation, too. [I would be home, in hearing,
if not sight, distance at all times.]

We've actually tried to find someone, without luck. Just in case, we're in
the Columbus, OH area! :)

Linda


In a message dated 1/3/03 5:57:40 PM Eastern Standard Time,
sammimag@... writes:


> The other thing she is considering is being a mommies
> helper. Would anyone pay a 7yo to play with their
> younger kids for an hour or so? Or would you want
> someone older I am thinking I would.
>

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
